Name: Statue of Isis
Description: The beautiful painted statue represents the goddess Isis standing, and wearing the white headdress called the khat ornamented with a red headband. She wears a green collar, two green armlets on each arm, and a white dress with a long red and blue belt. She is depicted with a bare bosom. The sculptor has used green for the cosmetic lines of the eyes and eyebrows instead of the traditional black. The goddess is stretching out her arms to protect the invisible body of her husband, the god Osiris
